Consumable.Name: Elixir of Chrono Sight
Consumable.Description: A mystical potion that allows the drinker to perceive brief glimpses of the future, enhancing reaction time.
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Crucial for deciphering visions that lead to hidden areas.

Consumable.Name: Temporal Shard
Consumable.Description: A fragment of condensed time, it can reset the immediate past, undoing recent events.
Consumable.Effects: Reverts the last 30 seconds of gameplay.
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Key for solving puzzles that require trial and error without consequence.

Consumable.Name: Quantum Flux Gel
Consumable.Description: A gel that, when applied, phases the user through dimensions, allowing for temporary invulnerability.
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Indispensable for bypassing insurmountable obstacles or enemies.
